åº”ç”¨æè¿°

Join fellow detectives all over the world in the official digital board game version of Clue/Cluedo! Gather crucial evidence, interrogate suspects and solve the original murder mystery. Follow Miss Scarlett, Colonel Mustard, Professor Plum, Chef White, Solicitor Peacock and Mayor Green through the iconic Tudor Mansion, unlocking their motives and alibis as you go. Enjoy Clue/Cluedo the way you remember it in Classic Mode, or jump in for a quick game with Clue Cards mode. Alternatively, if you want to really test your sleuthing skills, try a new investigation format available exclusively to Clue/Cluedo â€“ Ultimate Detective. In Ultimate Detective Mode, everyone answers suggestions at the same timeâ€¦but secretly! Face your suspects in a direct interrogation as you rely on your skills of deduction to get to the truth. Experience the mystery, solve the murder and become a top-tier detective! HOW TO PLAY CLUE/CLUEDO: 1. Three cards are dealt face-down and set aside â€“ this is the solution to the crime! 2. Everyone is dealt three Clue Cards. These are automatically crossed off your clue sheet, as they canâ€™t be part of the solution. 3. Roll the dice and move around the board. 4. When you enter a room, you can make a suggestion â€“ select who you think the murderer is, what weapon they used and where the crime happened. 5. Other players will then aim to disprove your suggestion; if one of your suggestions matches a card in their hand, they show you that card to disprove it. 6. Use your clue sheet to keep track of which characters, weapons and rooms have been disproven. 7. Think youâ€™ve figured it out? Itâ€™s time to make an accusation! Be careful though â€“ if youâ€™re right, you win, but if you are wrong, youâ€™re out! FEATURES - THE CLASSIC TUDOR MANSION â€“ Play the beloved original board game, now rendered in stunning 3D animation and entirely ad-free! - A BRAND-NEW GAME MODE â€“ Exclusive to the digital version of Clue/Cluedo, Ultimate Detective Mode lets you interrogate multiple characters at once. - MULTIPLE MODES â€“ Compete against cutting-edge AI opponents that adapt to your skill level for the perfect game, or challenge detectives around the world. - ADDITIONAL ORIGINAL CONTENT â€“ What happened after the shocking events of Tudor Mansion? Find out in a series of original new crime scenes designed specifically for the digital version of Clue/Cluedo! New characters emerge, bringing with them new clues, motives and case files to consider as you travel around the world in search of the truth. Sharpen your mind with the iconic murder-mystery board game, now available on mobile!

Punch your way through the Streets of Rage once again! Streets of Rage 4 takes forward the Streets of Rage legacy in this retro beat'em up with hand-drawn comic inspired graphics and updated mechanics. Streets of Rage comes back for a sequel 25 years after the last episode : a new crime syndicate seems to have taken control of the streets and corrupted the police. All you have to fight against them is your friends... and your fists ! Critically acclaimed, Streets of Rage 4 won several awards and nominated as Best Action Games at the 2020 Game Awards. FEATURES - Rediscover the classic Beat em up Streets of Rage Franchise with new fight mechanics - Get thrilled by the Retro hand-drawn comics-inspired artistic direction by the studio behind Wonder Boy: The Dragonâ€™s Trap serving juicy animations & vivid FX - Unlock up to 5 new & emblematic playable characters and fight your way through 12 various stages to bring back order to the streets - Challenge yourself in different modes : Story, Training, Arcade... - Listen to a new Electro OST with world class musicians such as Olivier DeriviÃ¨re and legend Yuzo Koshiro - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter"- Get retro with up to 13 alternative retro characters, secret retro levels or choose the SoR1&2 OST and enable the Retro Pixel graphics ! * NEW MAJOR FREE UPDATE* - New co-op moves - +300 in-game improvements - Brand-new custom survival mode to the DLC (Mr. X Nightmare) - New destroyables to help to maintain the combo counter -MULTIPLAYER UPDATE- - Play online with a partner and gang up to defeat the Y twins' evil plan together! - Test your strength : hop in Battle Mode and fight your friends across your favorite levels" -Mr. X Nightmare DLC- The fight continues in Wood Oak City. After the events of Streets of Rage 4, our heroes wanted to prepare themselves for future threats. Axel, Blaze and their mates will start a very special deranged training with the help of Dr. Zan, who built an AI program from the remnants of Mister Xâ€™s brain that simulates every kind of danger they could be facing. With this DLC, get ready for: â€¢ 3 new playable characters â€¢ A new Survival mode with weekly challenges â€¢ Character customization: build your own fighting style with new moves â€¢ New weapons and enemies!o note that multiplayer mode will not be available at launch but will come in a free update after release. CAREFULLY REDESIGNED FOR MOBILE - Revamped interface - Game Center achievements - iCloud - Share your progress between iOS devices - Compatible with MFicontrollers - No micro-transactions! Crack your knuckles and get ready for Streets of Rage 4 everywhere you go! If you run into a problem, please contact us at support@playdigious.mail.helpshift.com with as much information as possible on the issue, or check our FAQ at https://playdigious.helpshift.com/hc/en/6-streets-of-rage-4/

Your Lock Screen, Your Way. Create wallpapers that feel like you. Deco gives you everything you need to design custom lock screens and home screens â€” from photos of your favorite people to hand-picked gradients, all with a canvas that's a joy to use. **Start with a Background** Photos â€” Use any photo from your library. Deco intelligently separates subjects so stickers can tuck behind or in front of them. Gradients â€” Blend smooth color transitions with a full editor and curated presets. Stripes â€” Design custom stripe patterns. Control colors, angle, spacing, and more. Solids â€” Pick the exact color that fits your mood. Browse the new background selector with Top Picks that change by season, time, and holidays â€” plus categories like Nature, Moods, Vibrant, and Minimalist. **Sticker Studio** A complete sticker editor. Cut out photos, add text, drop in any emoji â€” then customize borders, colors, and apply effects like pixelate, comic book, or sketch. All your stickers in one place. **A Canvas That Flows** Smoother, higher resolution, and more intuitive. Resize and move at the same time, select multiple items, duplicate instantly. It just works. **Share What You Make** Export entire canvases or individual stickers. Share with friends or keep them for yourself. **Also Includes** - Quick emoji picker for instant additions - Import from Camera and Files - Sorting options throughout - New icon collections: Stickerbomb, Kamoji, and Developer Classics Deco won the Swift Student Challenge 2025.
